# lu77U-MobileSec

**The Only Mobile Security Tool Which You Need**

## Installation

```bash
pip install lu77U-MobileSec
```

## Usage

```bash
# Basic usage
lu77U-MobileSec

# With verbose mode
lu77U-MobileSec -V

# Show help
lu77U-MobileSec --help

# Show version
lu77U-MobileSec -v
```

## Requirements

- Python 3.12 or higher
- Internet connection for dependency installation
